body.name: BreathableBaby Breathable Mesh RailGuard Teething Cover — White — 51” Long Panel (1) — Fits Most Full-Size and Does Not Fit Mini Cribs — Use with Coordinating Short Panels for Extra Coverage

features: #1 BRAND RECOGNIZED FOR SAFETY: From BreathableBaby, makers of the original mesh liner with millions sold since 2002. Independently tested to meet or exceed relevant safety standards for juvenile products. Contains no harmful chemicals, flame retardants or formaldehyde.
HELPS PROTECT TEETH AND SAVE CRIB RAILS: Our teething covers help protect teeth and save crib rails without the risk of restricted airflow. A handy front pocket keeps pacifiers and teethers nearby.
BREATHABLE MESH WITH POLYESTER TRIM: Constructed from a single layer of Classic Mesh with A.C.T. Air Channel Technology (3 mm thick). Made of 100% polyester. 1” (2.54 cm) polyester trim.

FITS FULL-SIZE CRIBS: Includes 1 long panel 18" x 51" (45.7 cm x 129.5 cm). Securely attaches to most wide and thin crib rails. Use with coordinating short panels for additional coverage (sold separately). Does not fit mini/portable cribs or cradles.

EASY INSTALL AND CARE: Smartly adjusts to fit. Installs easily with hook and loop closure, and adjustable straps to create a secure fit. For best results, machine wash warm, gentle cycle. Secure all fabric fasteners before laundering to avoid snagging. Wash separately or with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low.
body.description: We developed the Breathable Mesh Crib RailGuard Teething Cover to help protect teeth and save crib rails while providing the peace of mind that’s possible only with our patented breathable mesh. Our Long Panel fits most full-size cribs and installs easily with hook and loop as well as adjustable straps to ensure a secure fit. And a handy front pocket keeps pacifiers and teethers nearby!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us BreathableBaby is all about parents’ little victories. Everything we do is to help caregivers feel more confident and in control. Putting safety first sparked the invention of the Breathable Mesh Crib Liner—the original crib liner. Safety continues to inspire innovations like the Breathable Mesh Crib, a standard in safe sleep. We design simple, smart, safe sleep products that enable mom and dads to feel fully prepared to tackle whatever parenthood serves up next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our child is such a termite haha she was eating through her crib so bad. This has been a life saver. It’s a little pricey but so worth it!! Works like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our 14-month-old daughter is teething really bad and decided to start chewing on her crib. We bought these to protect the crib and make her stop being able to chew on it. Works great. They have been on for about a week now and they have not come off whatsoever. We bought the matching side rail ones too and no issues with those either. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for children who bite frames
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to stop my child from biting the bed frame. While it doesn’t stop my child from biting, it prevents the bed frame from destruction. No more splinters!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it claims
reviews.reviewText: These were great for our teething toddler who began gnawing on her crib like a beaver. Her top crib rails are severely gashed but these have stopped her from doing any more damage or causing herself anymore splinters. They slide around a little bit even when using the ties and velcro but the rails are on the thinner side. Make sure the ties are facing out. She’s never really been interested in the ties or tried to take them off but I guess that may depend on the baby. These were the best option I could find on Amazon and I’m happy we tried them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty straightforward. Keeps my kiddo from chewing directly on the crib rail like a tiny beaver. Easy to attach and she can't figure out how to undo the ties which is a major bonus. Will absolutely be ordering more for the other sides of the crib!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works! 13 month old girl has not been able to pull it off and she can no longer teeth on the crib paint

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our little one started to chew his crib! We stuck this on there and he stopped!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a dangerous product that doesn't secure adequately.My one-year-old was holding on and the velcro became detached with her pulling. Because the middle tie secures only on one side, the cover pulled over to the inside of the crib in the middle and because she was holding on to it, she hit her head. Thankfully she's a sturdy kid and only had a bloody nose but if my baby had been younger or had she fallen in another way, she likely would have been seriously injured. This is a massive oversight. Imagine running into your nursery and your baby's face is covered in blood, and this stupid crib cover is pulled over on her. This should be recalled.
